title: Smart Data Models - ExcAVR2
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Italian excitation system corresponding to IEEE (1968) Type 2 Model. It represents alternator and rotating diodes and electromechanic voltage regulators.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcAVR2

e1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field voltage value 1 (E1).  Typical Value = 4.18. Default: 0.0

e2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field voltage value 2 (E2).  Typical Value = 3.14. Default: 0.0

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR gain (K).  Typical Value = 500. Default: 0.0

kf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rate feedback gain (K).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0.0

se1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Saturation factor at E1 (S(E1)).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

se2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Saturation factor at E2 (S(E2)).  Typical Value = 0.03. Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. AVR time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

tf1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rate feedback time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

tf2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rate feedback time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

vrmn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum AVR output (V).  Typical Value = -6. Default: 0.0

vrmx.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum AVR output (V).  Typical Value = 7. Default: 0.0
